name: A1
description:
This is the first piece in a series which will be "assembled." It is considered an "element." Collectors must acquire all seven elements (A1-A7) by a specified date to receive the fully assembled piece via airdrop. In order to receive the completed piece, the full set of seven elements must be burned by sending to waambatburn.tez. A date for the burn window will be posted in the description of element A7. Collectors may choose to hold the individual elements or assemble the full piece, but there will only be one window of time in which to do so.

waambat, 2021
Quantum Series - A1
Video Element, 2160x2160
Seamless Loop
